name: Ahu-Nixta Cataphract
description: The Ahu-Nixta Cataphract is a large aberration that embodies a fusion of mechanical and biological elements, protected by clockwork armor and featuring a shapeless mass with manipulators for combat.
memorable: Its ability to exit and enter its clockwork armor as a bonus action, alongside its formidable spellcasting and high Strength, makes it a unique and challenging opponent.
goals: Primarily engages in combat using both physical and magical attacks, leveraging its clockwork armor for tactical advantage.
relations: Possibly serves or is related to other aberrant beings or constructs.
environment: Typically found in places where biological and mechanical entities intersect.
strengths: High Armor Class and impressive Hit Points contribute to its resilience, while its ability to cast spells at will offers tactical versatility.
weaknesses: Becomes significantly weaker when removed from its clockwork armor, losing many benefits and becoming vulnerable.
attacks: Can perform multiple melee attacks, including slashing, piercing, and bludgeoning damage, while also executing spell attacks from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to cast spells at will, including powerful options like Fear and Telekinesis, enhances its battlefield control.
equipment: Clockwork armor which provides defense and additional functionalities.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive Perception score of 14.
skills: Boasts a perception skill proficiency that reflects its acute awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Damage immunities to poison and psychic damage.
Condition immunities to charmed, exhaustion, frightened, and more while within clockwork armor.
Clockwork Encasement provides tactical flexibility in combat.
Immutable Form protects against spells that alter form.
High Strength score leads to powerful melee capabilities.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with a focus on Intelligence, allowing it to cast Fear, Fire Bolt, and Telekinesis at will.
